thread.title: Reebok’s Newest Instapump Fury Road CC Is Its Boldest Yet
thread.title_full: Reebok’s Newest Instapump Fury Road CC Is Its Boldest Yet

author: Marcus Cho
title: Reebok’s Newest Instapump Fury Road CC Is Its Boldest Yet
text:
Visit the original post to see all 7 images from this gallery. 
The Reebok Instapump Fury Road is a pretty overwhelming silhouette as-is, with its built-up midsole and internal Pump bladder giving it a bold look. Now, after the wild “Moon Rock” colorway release of the sneaker , Reebok is bringing the Instapump Fury Road back with a bold new colorway.
The new edition dubbed “Black/Solar Yellow/White” features a camo design on the upper in various color themes such as red, blue, and brown camo. On the midsole, you’ll find that the sneaker has been once again equipped with Reebok’s EVA midsole for optimal cushioning and shock absorption, while the look is rounded off by a high abrasion rubber outsole for traction.
The “Black/Solar Yellow/White” Reebok Instapump Fury Road CC is now available at retailers such as Sneaker Politics .
